biotools.summary: Tool for sequence feature visualization and comparison; integrates with Internet Explorer;  accepts GenBank Flat Files, GenBank HTML, FASTA files; plugins exist for visualization of output from RepeatMasker, PsiPred, and Cister.

bioschemas.name: SeqVISTA
